official_title: Supporting the goals and ideals of International Water Safety Day.

summary.text: Expresses support for the goals and ideals of International Water Safety Day. Acknowledges: (1) that water safety education should be included in primary and secondary school education, (2) the importance of water safety education, and (3) that every person should learn to swim.

titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of International Water Safety Day.
